AboutCompany.paragraph: We are a company committed to developing high-quality software targeted at major languages for Engineers and students aspiring to learn English as their second language. Our mission is to bridge language barriers within the tech community, facilitating a more inclusive environment where knowledge and opportunities can be accessed by non-native English speakers. We believe in empowering our users with the tools they need to succeed in a global market.

AboutProduct.paragraph: This project is dedicated to teaching professionals and students in Software Engineering how to construct an effective resume in English. The aim is to provide comprehensive guidance that covers the nuances of crafting a CV that stands out in the competitive tech industry. By focusing on the English language, we cater to those seeking to expand their opportunities in international domains where English is a predominant language of communication.
